questions.question: What is special about the Universitat Autònoma station in Barcelona?

choices.A: It's the biggest station in Barcelona
choices.B: It's a very old station, built over 100 years ago
choices.C: It's located inside a university campus
choices.D: It's the only station in Barcelona with a big park nearby

questions.question: What can you see near the Universitat Autònoma station?

choices.B: A big beach with palm trees

questions.question: Why is the Universitat Autònoma station named like that?

choices.A: Because it's near a big auto shop
choices.B: Because it's the last station on the line
choices.C: Because it's located inside the Autonomous University of Barcelona
choices.D: Because it's a very autonomous station
